title: The Sin of Nadab and Abihu
summary: Leviticus 10 recounts how Aaronâ€™s sons, Nadab and Abihu, offer unauthorized fire before God and are consumed by His judgment. The chapter emphasizes holiness, priestly conduct, and distinguishing between clean and unclean.

faq.question: Why were Nadab and Abihu punished?
faq.answer: They offered unauthorized fire before the Lord, violating His command.

faq.question: What lessons were taught to the priests?
faq.answer: To treat God as holy, follow His instructions carefully, and avoid serving while impaired.
